data.title: Michael Connelly Videos
data.meta_description: Book videos, TV commercials, and video interviews with bestselling author Michael Connelly.
data.text:
A short film in 3 parts for The Brass Verdict. Part 1 — The Hit. In this clip , an associate of Mickey Haller’s gets a fatal phone call, which, in turn, draws Mickey out of retirement and into a web of intrigue. This video stars Corbin Bernsen.

Part 2 — Night Drive. In this clip, Mickey Haller, the Lincoln Lawyer, cruises Los Angeles at night and ruminates about his job.

Part 3 — The Brass Verdict. In this clip, go on a ride with Michael Connelly while he introduces his book.

Four excerpts from Michael Connelly’s novel, The Overlook, have been brought to life with excerpts read by Len Cariou, illustrations by Larry Moore, original music written and performed by Frank Morgan.

The opening of Michael Connelly’s novel, Echo Park, is brought to life in this video.
